ygData.subject: Re: Okay ....let see....
ygData.msgSnippet: I respect your views on this list, and I hope you respect mine.  Therefore I will alter how I use it. I refuse to cease RP on this list (and that is what it
ygData.messageBody:
I respect your views on this list, and I hope you respect mine. Therefore I
will alter how I use it.

I refuse to cease RP on this list (and that is what it has been, although at
a basic level), but I will refrain from idle chatter. I hope this will
allow you to continue using it.

I will, where possible be in character, and therefore my characters opinions
will be evident. Erudites ARE arrogant and consider themselves above other
races. They have no time for fools, and will therefore not always be
friendly towards others.

Bear in mind, there are a lot of new people coming into the game every day,
and I hope that the mindless banter gives them an idea of how the races
COULD interact (I would not be so arrogant myself as to presume that my
interpretation is the correct one. Itan would of course).

Steve

P.S.

It is not a hatred of other races (at least not all of them), merely a
disrespect.
